snippet: A North Korean diplomat is accusing Western nations on the United Nations Security Council of "turning a blind eye" to acts of torture and spying by the United States and focusing only on human rights violations in his country....

headline.print_headline: NKorea Accuses UN of Discussing Its Rights, Not US Torture
headline.main: NKorea Accuses UN of Discussing Its Rights, Not US Torture

lead_paragraph: A North Korean diplomat is accusing Western nations on the United Nations Security Council of "turning a blind eye" to acts of torture and spying by the United States and focusing only on human rights violations in his country.
